rbitemplate

This is a pkgdown template for websites across the RBI.

For sites, ensure DESCRIPTION contains:

Config/Needs/website:
    pkgdown,
    rnabioco/rbitemplate

and add this to package _pkgdown.yml:

template:
  package: rbitemplate
  bootstrap: 5
